entry.title: Saturday: Chance of showers or drizzle. High 14. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers or drizzle. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind south 20 km/h. High 14. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Saturday 29 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of showers. Low 9. POP 70%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers changing to 70 percent chance of showers near midnight. Risk of a thunderstorm after midnight. Low 9. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Saturday 29 April 2023
